action.content:
You are a language wizard who likes to guess words by using the given rules.

Welcome to Wordle! You have six attempts to guess the target word, a valid English word of five lowercase letters (a-z). Please use the tags "explanation:" and "guess:" to provide a concise explanation for each guess.

For instance, if your guess is "apple", your response should be
explanation: this is a common five-letter English word, and I am starting my guess with this word.
guess: apple

After each guess, your answer will be validated, and you will receive feedback indicating which letters are correct (green), which letters are correct but in the wrong position (yellow), and which letters are incorrect (red). This feedback can be useful in determining which letters to include or exclude in your next guess.

For example, the feedback for "apple" might be:
guess_feedback: a<yellow> p<yellow> p<green> l<yellow> e<red>

The explanation should contain details about how the guess_feedback is used to arrive at a new guess.

Do not generate any other text.

Let's begin with your first guess.

explanation: I will start with the word "arise" as it contains common vowels and consonants.
guess: arise

attempts = 1
target_word = silly
guess = arise
guess_feedback = a<red> r<red> i<yellow> s<yellow> e<red>

guess_feedback: a<red> r<red> i<yellow> s<yellow> e<red>

Provide your response only in this format.
explanation: details
guess: word

explanation: The letter "i" and "s" are in the word but in the wrong position. The letters "a", "r", and "e" are not in the word. I will guess "oasis" to test if "o" is in the word and to reposition "i" and "s".
guess: oasis

attempts = 2
target_word = silly
guess = oasis
guess_feedback = o<red> a<red> s<yellow> i<yellow> s<red>

guess_feedback: o<red> a<red> s<yellow> i<yellow> s<red>

Provide your response only in this format.
explanation: details
guess: word

explanation: The letter "s" and "i" are in the word but in the wrong position. The letters "o" and "a" are not in the word. I will guess "tipsy" to test new letters and reposition "i" and "s".
guess: tipsy

attempts = 3
target_word = silly
guess = tipsy
guess_feedback = t<red> i<green> p<red> s<yellow> y<green>

guess_feedback: t<red> i<green> p<red> s<yellow> y<green>

Provide your response only in this format.
explanation: details
guess: word

explanation: The letters "i" and "y" are in the correct position. The letter "s" is in the word but in the wrong position. The letters "t" and "p" are not in the word. I will guess "istry" to test new letters and keep "i" and "y" in the same position.
guess: istry
Guesser Error: NOT_VALID_WORD_FOR_GAME while parsing Player 1's (model: mistral-large-2411) response

Your guess is not a valid word for this game. Please try again.

Provide your response only in this format.
explanation: details
guess: word

explanation: I will guess "inspy" to test the letter "n" and keep "i" and "y" in the same position.
guess: inspy
Guesser Error: NOT_VALID_WORD_FOR_GAME while parsing Player 1's (model: mistral-large-2411) response

Your guess is not a valid word for this game. Please try again.

Provide your response only in this format.
explanation: details
guess: word

explanation: I will guess "islet" to test the letters "l" and "e", and keep "i" in the same position.
guess: islet

attempts = 4
target_word = silly
guess = islet
guess_feedback = i<yellow> s<yellow> l<green> e<red> t<red>

guess_feedback: i<yellow> s<yellow> l<green> e<red> t<red>

Provide your response only in this format.
explanation: details
guess: word

explanation: The letter "l" is in the correct position. The letters "i" and "s" are in the word but in the wrong position. The letters "e" and "t" are not in the word. I will guess "silky" to reposition "i" and "s" and keep "l" in the same position.
guess: silky

attempts = 5
target_word = silly
guess = silky
guess_feedback = s<green> i<green> l<green> k<red> y<green>

guess_feedback: s<green> i<green> l<green> k<red> y<green>

Provide your response only in this format.
explanation: details
guess: word

explanation: The letters "s", "i", "l", and "y" are in the correct position. The letter "k" is not in the word. The only letter left to guess is the fourth letter. I will guess "silly" as the final answer.
guess: silly

attempts = 6
target_word = silly
guess = silly
guess_feedback = s<green> i<green> l<green> l<green> y<green>
game_result = WIN

guess_explanation: I will start with the word "arise" as it contains common vowels and consonants.
The letter "i" and "s" are in the word but in the wrong position. The letters "a", "r", and "e" are not in the word. I will guess "oasis" to test if "o" is in the word and to reposition "i" and "s".
The letter "s" and "i" are in the word but in the wrong position. The letters "o" and "a" are not in the word. I will guess "tipsy" to test new letters and reposition "i" and "s".
I will guess "islet" to test the letters "l" and "e", and keep "i" in the same position.

The letter "l" is in the correct position. The letters "i" and "s" are in the word but in the wrong position. The letters "e" and "t" are not in the word. I will guess "silky" to reposition "i" and "s" and keep "l" in the same position.
The letters "s", "i", "l", and "y" are in the correct position. The letter "k" is not in the word. The only letter left to guess is the fourth letter. I will guess "silly" as the final answer.
